name: Specialist Olin

topics.topic_text: Okay, guess I'll get to it.
topics.response_text: Okay, good luck. And don't worry -- we'll be right here when you get out.

topics.topic_text: Whoa, slow down! Can we just talk for a bit?
topics.response_text: Oh, I... I'm sorry. Things have been tense here lately, and I'm afraid it's getting the better of me.
Look, if you're going to help out, then that's great. Just don't get in my way.

topics.topic_text: Nice attitude. This how you treat everyone that tries to help you?
topics.response_text: Until you actually do something that helps us out, you're just one more liability.

topics.topic_text: Oh, I get it. You're doing the "tough" routine.
topics.response_text: What? Is that some kind of joke?

topics.topic_text: Hey, look. I'm just trying to get some more information.
topics.response_text: Fine, hurry up then. What do you want?

topics.topic_text: Can you tell me more about what you're doing here?
topics.response_text: Same thing we're always doing: Locating technology, preserving it, and making sure it doesn't fall into the wrong hands.

topics.topic_text: What can you tell me about this simulation?
topics.response_text: Don't you know? This sim had to have been one of the most important of its time -- it's the liberation of Anchorage, Alaska from the Chinese.

topics.topic_text: Why exactly do you need me?
topics.response_text: The simulation needs an external interface device to run correctly. I'm not exactly sure why, the records on that are spotty at best.

topics.topic_text: I've got some equipment in need of repairs.
topics.response_text: Normally I'd never consider this, but I probably wouldn't be alive if it weren't for you. I'd say that warrants an exception.

conversation.response_text: Fine, then get out and let me do my job.
You're not sitting in that thing unless you're wearing the suit for it. I'm not going to have you fry the circuits.

description:
Specialist Olin is a 38 year-old Caucasian Female.

A technical specialist and former member of the Brotherhood of Steel who now serves the Outcasts at the Virtual Strategic Solutions facility. Olin is responsible for maintaining and operating the pre-War simulation technology, particularly the Anchorage Reclamation simulation.

Specialist Olin's Personality: Olin is pragmatic, technically-minded, and determined. She takes pride in her work and is frustrated by technical limitations. While loyal to the Outcast cause, she occasionally questions the wisdom of their methods, though she keeps these thoughts to herself.

Specialist Olin's Backstory: Born and raised in the Capital Wasteland, Olin joined the Brotherhood of Steel in her youth, drawn by their mission to preserve pre-War technology. She served faithfully under Elder Owyn Lyons for many years, but grew increasingly disillusioned with his deviation from the Brotherhood's traditional principles. When Lyons refused to follow the orders of the West Coast elders, Olin sided with the hardliners led by Henry Casdin, forming the Outcasts. Her technical expertise earned her a place in the group led by Protector McGraw that seized control of the Virtual Strategic Solutions facility in Washington D.C. Olin now oversees the facility's technology, particularly working to unlock the armory secured by the Anchorage Reclamation simulation. Despite her considerable skills, she has been unable to bypass the system's requirements, a fact that has earned her the derision of Defender Sibley.
